name: Untitled Ghost Game (Diannara)
description:
A vengeful spirit has trapped you inside the house. Your task is to find the Master Skeleton Key and escape the mansion before the spirit hunts you down. If they catch you it's game over.

Search the mansion for other items that might help you ward off or evade the ghost long enough for you to find the key and escape!

Controls: 

  •  W, S, A, D to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • C to Crouch
  • Left Shift to Sprint
  • E, F, or Left-Mouse to Interact with doors, drawers, and pick up the key
  • ESC or Q to bring up the Settings Menu during gameplay (Note: does not pause the game)
